news_header: Santorini experiences multiple earthquakes, prompting a state of emergency as thousands evacuate.
news_original_title: Santorini rocked by more earthquakes as uncertainty grows
news_text: Santorini has been hit by several earthquakes, leading to a state of emergency declared by authorities. Thousands of residents have evacuated the island due to ongoing seismic activity, including a 4.6 magnitude quake recorded on Thursday evening. Night patrols have been initiated to prevent looting, and experts warn that the seismic crisis may continue for weeks. Although no injuries or significant damage have been reported, preparations are underway for potential larger quakes. The Greek Prime Minister has assured that all necessary plans are in place for the safety of residents.
